message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway just yet. I can do $130, and that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so how about $115?
I'm not quite there yet, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $125, and that's my final offer.
I'm still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer. How about $122.50?
I'm willing to meet you halfway from my last offer, but I'm not going to go any lower. I can do $127.50, and that's as low as I'm willing to go.
